## Exercises 

In Exercises 3 and 4, display the following vectors using arrows
on an xy-graph: u, v, -v, -2v, u + v, u - v, and u - 2v. Notice
that u - v is the vertex of a parallelogram whose other vertices are
u, 0, and -v.
